cPostPathCutNotification Class Reference

This notification is fired at the end of cGate::disconnect() on the owner modules of the start AND end gates of the connection path that was cut when the gate got disconnected. More...

#include <cmodelchange.h>

Inheritance diagram for cPostPathCutNotification:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This notification is fired at the end of cGate::disconnect() on the owner modules of the start AND end gates of the connection path that was cut when the gate got disconnected.

See cPathChangeNotification for more details.
